FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for a customized event.
The undo description command restores the default configuration. The description command configures a description for a customized event. The undo description command restores the default configuration. By default, no description is configured for a customized event.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a description for a customized event.
The value is a string of 1 to 55 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: When associating a sampling path with a customized event, you can run the description command to configure a description for the customized event. The description helps a controller determine the meaning or possible impact of the customized event.
